text: Lion Devouring a Rabbit (c. 1855), by Eugène Delacroix Lion Devouring a Rabbit is a c.1855 painting by the French artist Eugène Delacroix, now in the Louvre in Paris. ==References== category:Paintings of the Louvre by French artists category:1855 paintings category:Paintings by Eugène Delacroix Category:Lions in art Category:Rabbits and hares in art
title: Lion Devouring a Rabbit
